science.title: The Science
science.subtitle: Understanding the Life-Lag Score
science.overview: Life-Lag is a weekly tune-up built on well-established stress science: strain tends to build gradually, and small shifts in sleep, energy, and follow-through can show up before things feel "obvious."
science.disclaimer: This isn't medical advice, diagnosis, or treatmentâ€”just a practical way to notice drift early and adjust gently.
science.problem: Problem: issues are often noticed too late
science.map: How the science maps to the product
